website_summaries.verdict: The tire that gives you the best value for your money. Offers an unbeatable combination of price and value.
pros: Dozens of owners claim that the AltiMAX handles the best of any tire they’ve ever mounted on a vehicle and swear by it
cons: The warranty time is slightly shorter than other models on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Tire!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the rear of my motorcycle (yes, I know it's a car tire!!) and it has been working very well so far. I have about 3,500 miles on it right now and it still looks like a brand new tire! It rides well and has excellent traction. I expect to get at least 20,000 miles out of this tire!! That's well over twice as many miles as most motorcycle tires making this a great value!! As always, Amazon did a great job with the shipping got it here fast. Our car will need tires pretty soon and I believe I will be buying four more of these. (-:
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, good handling tire. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: 2014 Honda Civic. 20K miles/year. Replaced the set of "fleet tires" that came with it June of '16. As you can imagine, the GT Altimax RT43's are a huge improvement. I researched these on tirerack.com last year and found them to be the best value for my situation. First impressions are excellent. Very quiet and confident traction in both dry and wet pavement here in West Michigan. Had Discount Tire do the the install for just over $100. I will update this review once the snow flies.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stuit

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had a reason to buy 4 more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tires to replace the factory delivered ones on my VW Golf. I live in Chicago, and from day one the factory ones never performed well in the rain, snow, or ice. I was always fishtailing, spinning, etc and never felt confident driving. These new tires have completely transformed my car. We are having a snowy winter and they are performing perfectly and I feel so much better driving my car around. They have traction, they don't fishtail, and they have amazing grip. Quiet too! I want to purchase 4 more just to keep for a future car. So happy I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 5000 miles in but it's already been through ice, snow, spring downpour, ice again, and rain with heavy wind! All within the first month of having them! But really for the price how much better does it really get?
customer_reviews.author: lock_a

customer_reviews.title: Tires are great - top rated by a consumer magazine
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I expected to be a negative - but was not - is that the original tires are made to maximize mileage, and I expected any replacement to be much worse. But so far I'm not seeing that (although driving less because of COVID!) - mileage is pretty much the same as I was getting with the original tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Good tire in most conditions and affordable
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tires for the money and available in most sizes
customer_reviews.author: clearanceman

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire....went on my bike so I only bought one, but it’s got 6k miles so far and still looks new
customer_reviews.author: jason pierdominici

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price I found and the product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: shivels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. I purchased these for my moms car. They look nice and handle nice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Better than last set of tires I had for wet roads
customer_reviews.author: Wayne 68

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good price and sears installed them. They seem pretty loud going 50 mph but faster than that is fine
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Great tires and service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these tires and they are wonderful and Very quiet. I am going to buy another set for my wife's car now. When I received the tires one had a cut on the sidewall all the way thru. Must have happened while in shipping. I contacted the seller and spoke to the internet sales manager and he jumped right on the matter and had the tire picked up and issued me a refund. I had already purchased another tire to save on time cause I was going on a trip. Customer service was beyond words. I WILL buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LOOKING TIRE. I JUST INSTALLED THEM YESTERDAY AND ITS A GREAT TIRE. THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. Smooth and quiet. This is my second pair. Sold the car with the first pair, so not sure about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Get these.
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for my car. Noticed car ride got better with less noise. Handling is excellent, great in snow as well, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great handling tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires handle good in rain non directional tread unlike my previous altimax tires and they produce a quiet ride.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rubber, smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, great traction in all conditions. I usually get two years out of tires,three if they are Michelin, been using these for 2.75 years and I would say they have another year easily. That's probably around 60k total miles. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: marcjt

customer_reviews.title: This is a good tire for smaller cars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tire for smaller cars. I have used several sets of them on different vehicles and still like them. It is quiet and has a good wet/dry grip. If you want a step up, that would be Continental DWS 06, but this comes fairly close for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great tires - Good value
customer_reviews.text: We are on the second set of General Altimax tires on my wife's car and Ipreviously installed Altimax tires on the rear of my '33 Chevy Streetrod, so it was only natural to replace the front tires on my Streetrod with Altimaxs. They have given us excellent tread wear, good handling and are very resistant to hydroplaning during heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: General AltiMAX RT43 Radial Tire - 195/65R15 91T
product_meta.description: 4/32nds Roughly 40% tread life Remaining, All used inventory is subject to one repair in the tread area. Please contact us before purchase for any condition inquiry.
